hero.headline: The Best Laundry Cafe in the Bay Area!
hero.subheadline: Where fresh laundry meets fresh coffee — relax while we handle the wash. Come try the Bay Area's safest laundry cafe. We're open 24/7 so our door is always open for you!

video.url: <iframe title="vimeo-player" src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/394353671?h=d1cebace6d" width="640" height="360" frameborder="0" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; web-share"   allowfullscreen></iframe>

about.title: About Wash Cafe
about.description: At Wash Café in San Mateo, we combine the comfort of a neighborhood café with the convenience of modern laundry services. Whether you’re here to sip on a latte, catch up on work, or simply unwind, you’ll enjoy a welcoming space where your laundry gets done quickly, cleanly, and stress-free. Our mission is to make laundry day something you look forward to.
features: Upfront, Transparent Pricing: No hidden fees or surprises.
24/7 Services: We're here when you need us.
Licensed and Insured: Your clothes are safe with us.
Commitment to Sustainable Practices: Environmentally conscious solutions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional solutions tailored to your needs

items.title: Cafe
items.description: Enjoy a nice brew in our 5 star coffee lounge.

items.title: Laundry
items.description: Top of the line washing machines. Coin operated but also accept card.

items.title: Drying
items.description: Top of the line drying machines. Coin operated but also accept card.

items.title: One Stop Convenience
items.description: Take care of your laundry and enjoy a great cup of coffee in a single visit, saving you valuable time.

items.title: Modern Comfort
items.description: Relax in a clean, stylish, and welcoming environment designed to make laundry day enjoyable.

items.title: Expert Laundry Care
items.description: Your clothes are treated with professional-level cleaning and handling for the best results.

items.title: Connected Lounge
items.description: Stay productive while you wait with complimentary Wi-Fi and ample workspace-friendly areas.

items.title: Eco-Smart Machines
items.description: We use high-efficiency washers and dryers that are gentle on your clothes and the environment.

items.title: Community Hub
items.description: More than just laundry — it’s a place to multitask, socialize, or simply take a break while chores get done.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what our satisfied clients have to say about our professional services.

items.reviewText: "Such a smart idea! I grabbed a latte, got some work done with the free Wi-Fi, and my laundry was finished before I knew it. Super clean and welcoming spot."
“Best laundry experience I’ve ever had. The machines are fast and eco-friendly, and the staff folded everything perfectly. Plus, the coffee is actually amazing!”
“I love coming here on weekends. It feels more like a cozy café than a laundromat, and I always run into friendly people. Makes laundry day fun instead of a chore.”

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us today. We're here to help with all your needs.
contact.consentText: By checking this box, you agree to receive communications from us.

footer.privacyPolicyText:
Privacy Policy

Effective date: October 8, 2025

Controller: Example Company LLC, 123 Example Ave, Sample City, CA 90000, US · Email: privacy@example.com

This policy explains what data is collected, how it is used and shared, and the rights available under applicable laws such as GDPR and CCPA/CPRA.

Scope

This policy applies to the website and mobile applications operated by Example Company LLC and related services provided globally.

Data We Collect

  • Account data: name, email, username, password (hashed).
  • Usage data: IP address, device and browser, pages viewed, timestamps.
  • Transaction data: orders, billing details, limited payment metadata via processor.
  • Marketing preferences: subscriptions and communication settings.
  • Cookies/trackers: identifiers for analytics, functionality, and ads where applicable.

Data is collected directly, automatically through the service, and from service providers as described below.

Purposes and Legal Bases

  • Provide and maintain services (Contract).
  • Security, fraud prevention, and debugging (Legitimate interests).
  • Compliance with legal obligations (Legal obligation).
  • Analytics and improvement (Legitimate interests or Consent, depending on jurisdiction).
  • Marketing communications (Consent, with opt-out options).

How We Process

Data is processed via forms, account features, automatic logs, cookies, and third-party processors (e.g., payments, analytics, hosting, email delivery).

No automated decision-making or profiling with legal effects is performed unless stated otherwise.

Sharing and Disclosures

  • Payment processors to process transactions.
  • Analytics providers to measure and improve performance.
  • Cloud hosting and storage vendors to deliver the service.
  • Email service providers for transactional and marketing emails.

Disclosures may occur for legal compliance, to protect rights and safety, or during business transfers.

Your Rights

Depending on location, rights may include access, rectification, erasure, restriction, portability, objection, and the right to withdraw consent.

To exercise rights, send a request to privacy@example.com. Reasonable identity verification may be required. Responses are provided within the timeframes set by law.

Data Retention

  • Account data is retained for the life of the account and a reasonable period thereafter.
  • Transaction records are retained for statutory periods (for example, up to 7 years).
  • Usage and cookie data is retained per cookie lifetimes or aggregated/anonymized.

Security

Measures include TLS encryption in transit, access controls, monitoring and logging, and vendor due diligence including DPAs where required.

No method of transmission or storage is completely secure, and residual risk cannot be eliminated.

Cookies and Tracking

Types include strictly necessary, functional, analytics, and advertising cookies. Non-essential cookies may require consent depending on jurisdiction.

Preferences can be managed via the cookie banner or browser settings, and can be changed at any time.

International Transfers

Where data is transferred internationally, appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses or adequacy decisions are used.

Children’s Privacy

The service is not directed to children below applicable age thresholds, and data is not knowingly collected from them.

Changes to This Policy

Material changes will be posted with an updated effective date, and additional notice may be provided where required.

Contact

Questions or requests: privacy@example.com. Individuals may have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority in their jurisdiction.

Jurisdictional Notices

GDPR (EEA/UK)

  • Lawful bases are listed above; data subjects have the rights listed in the Rights section.
  • Transfers outside the EEA/UK rely on appropriate safeguards such as SCCs or adequacy decisions.

California (CCPA/CPRA)

  • California residents have rights to know, delete, correct, and opt out of sale or sharing of personal information.
  • Two or more methods will be provided to submit requests; an opt-out mechanism is available for targeted advertising where applicable.
© Example Company LLC

tabs.htmlContent:
Lunetta

Lunch • 11:30–3:00 | Downtown | Seasonal

Lunch Menu

Fresh, seasonal plates crafted with local produce and housemade breads.

Starters

Citrus Ceviche — $14
White fish, lime, ají limo, red onion, sweet potato, cancha.
Gluten-free
Roasted Tomato Soup — $9
San Marzano tomatoes, basil oil, garlic croutons, cream swirl.
Vegetarian
Crispy Calamari — $13
Lemon zest batter, parsley, smoked paprika aioli.

Mains

Grilled Chicken Panino — $16
Herb-marinated chicken, provolone, arugula, confit tomato, basil mayo on ciabatta.
Quinoa Power Bowl — $15
Tri-color quinoa, avocado, roasted squash, chickpeas, pepitas, citrus vinaigrette.
Vegan
Seared Salmon — $22
Brown butter glaze, fennel-orange salad, herbed farro.

Sides

Hand-cut Fries — $6
Sea salt, rosemary, garlic aioli.
Market Greens — $7
Mixed lettuces, radish, cucumber, lemon-herb dressing.

Desserts

Lemon Posset — $8
Silky lemon cream, macerated berries, shortbread crumb.
Chocolate Torte — $9
Flourless dark chocolate, espresso whip, cocoa nibs.

Beverages

House Lemonade — $5
Fresh lemon, raw sugar, mint.

Cold Brew — $5
12-hour steep, chocolate notes.

Iced Tea — $4
Black or peach herbal, lightly sweetened.

Sparkling Water — $3
Lime twist.

Allergies? Please inform the team. Cross-contact may occur in a shared kitchen.
